thread.section_title: TheShowerSealShop.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of theshowersealshop.com
thread.title: Julie Vickers

author: Julie Vickers
title: Julie Vickers
text: I’ve been looking to replace the seal on my shower screen for ages but when I went online, there were many for sale but none of them showed the measurements clearly enough for me to go ahead with the purchase. The Shower Seal shop are obviously a specialist shop so even though I’ve paid more than other sites/shops, I was confident that it would be the right size for my screen. I had e-mails to let me know that my order was being dealt with, when it was dispatched, and when it would arrive. The packaging was very sturdy and well done. I would definitely recommend The Shower Seal Shop, thank you!
